text: nabivarayata, duskara kalayehi ohu va anugamanaya kala vu (makkaven) nikma giyavunata ha (nikma giya makka vasinta) udav kalavunata allah pascattapaya piligena samava dunneya. ovun aturin pirisakage hadavat (venatakata) nÃ¦mburuvannata tibuna da, pasu va ovun kerehi pascattapaya piligena samava dunneya. niyata vasayenma ohu ovun sambandhayen sanukampitaya. karunavantaya
